summary: Cloud Computing (Elective-I Option C) is a comprehensive course designed to build strong foundational knowledge in this important area. This subject covers 5 key modules that progressively develop your understanding. You'll gain both theoretical insights and practical skills through lectures and assignments. The course prepares you for advanced studies and professional applications. Mastering this subject will significantly contribute to your academic and career success.
recommended_books: Cloud Computing: A Practical Approach – Velte
Architecting the Cloud – Michael J. Kavis
course_outcomes: Recall basic concepts of cloud computing.
Identify mechanisms and architectures of cloud computing.
Analyze cloud security services and architectures.
Compare different cloud services and case studies.
prerequisites: Basics knowledge of networking and computer fundamentals
